mapper.select: SELECT p.`factory_name` `name`,SUM(p.`amount`) `value` FROM co_contract_product p WHERE p.`company_id`=#{companyId} GROUP BY p.`factory_name`
SELECT p.`product_no` `name` , SUM(p.`amount`) `value` FROM co_contract_product p WHERE p.`company_id`=#{companyId} GROUP BY p.`product_no` ORDER BY SUM(p.`amount`) DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT i.`A1` `name`, IFNULL(temp.num,0) `value` FROM st_online_info i LEFT JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(l.time,'%H') h , COUNT(*) num FROM st_sys_log l GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(l.time,'%H')) temp ON i.`A1`=temp.h
